dialogue.content: So you are leaving us? The old man wanted to see you. He has something you definitely need.
The old man is waiting for you.
Ah… you came. The winds told me you would set out soon.
dialogue.answer: Yes, I’m leaving the village. You asked to see me?

dialogue.content: Indeed. The road beyond Ararat is not kind. You’ll need more than courage to walk it.
dialogue.answer: I’ve faced danger before. What are you trying to say?

dialogue.content: Take this sword. It was forged in the fires beneath the mountain, before my time. It will not fail you if your heart stays true.
dialogue.answer: I… I don’t know what to say. Thank you, Arsen.

dialogue.content: Do not thank me. Thank the mountain that still watches over us. Now go — destiny waits for no one.
